headline: Comcast Completes Network Expansion in Litchfield County, Delivering High-Speed Internet to Nearly 22,000 Homes and Businesses
summary: LITCHFIELD, Conn., December 15, 2025--Comcast today announced the completion of its network expansion to nearly 22,000 new homes and businesses in Litchfield County, delivering reliable, high-speed, symmetrical Internet from America’s smartest and most reliable converged network. With this milestone, residents and businesses in Litchfield, Morris, Thomaston, Torrington and Watertown now have access to Comcast’s full suite of Xfinity and Comcast Business services – giving customers more speed, sa
